name: scuppernong
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of green grape (= a small fruit used to make wine) that grows in the United States: The scuppernong grows wild all over the southern states. The garden at the back of the house has several rows of scuppernong vines.
More examplesFewer examplesShe owns a farm in North Carolina where she grows scuppernongs.My neighbour brought round a couple of jars of homemade scuppernong jelly for me to try.He spilled a glass of scuppernong wine over his lap.
